alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 2:13PM CDT until June 25 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Moore County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Franklin County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 213 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tullahoma, or 8 miles north of Lynchburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winchester, Lynchburg, Decherd, Estill Springs, Cowan, Tims Ford Lake, Woods Reservoir, Arnold AFB and Alto. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
